title: Pink: Dolorosa
description: Charlie, fondly known as twink, is on the loose in Dolorosa, and he’s finding the single life tougher than he expected. Ben wouldn’t agree to be a dad, so Charlie is pursuing his dreams of fatherhood alone. Dr. Fell keeps a stern eye on Charlie as he juggles his roles as potential papa, leather-slut, and career boy. Events come to a head at Dr. Fell and Dave’s commitment ceremony!
author: Syd McGinley
